title: "The Voice will be practical as well as symbolic says Tom Calma"
excerpt: "The practical benefits of enshrining an Indigenous advisory group such as the voice in the Constitution include long overdue progress in closing the gap in health, education and employment, First Nations Referendum Working Group member Tom Calma has argued."
